name: Acme-Hardesty - Palmitic Acid (C16)
description: Acme-Hardesty supplies high-purity Palmitic Acid (Hexadecanoic Acid, C16) for barrier repair formulations. Minimum 98% pure palmitic acid is essential for lipid barrier formation and provides emulsification and thickening properties. Several varieties available for different industrial processes including cosmetic applications.
notes: CAS 57-10-3. Minimum 98% purity ensures high quality for cosmetic applications. Palmitic acid is a critical structural lipid in the skin barrier, comprising approximately 20-25% of stratum corneum lipids. Essential component of ceramide-cholesterol-fatty acid barrier repair systems.
